1620860.name: Chicken Holmes - Chanislavski Whispers
1620860.description:
Stranger Things Happens
Seems the world is upside down
The power of the bananas was used and none of our heros managed to get out. So this is the effect of the Anvils?


Chanislavski Headquarters
Seems the Doctor has faced serious problems and maybe macabre abductees.
The fear rules our heros minds. The sanity almost turns to a deluxe item and you are the unique capable to help them get out.

Where is Judite at these hours?
Surprise! These informations Digueliro don't have. Now it's all in their wings. Our hero is completely lost and confuse in this alternate reality. There is none informations and he will need to use all of your few mental resources and logical capability to resolve the problems of this world.
Entirely bewildered with a octopus and a crazy duck, is he capable to ride all your partners off this place or are they mere fools with big dimensional troubles?

The second game of our greatest Chicken

This game will continue our most impressive, nonsense and marvelous animal adventure, now better because of the alternate reality.
Have fun (or horror) in this new step of our "heros" journey. Without your help they won't be able to solve this case. Their brains are equivalent to approximately 10% of your, as Judite tells me.

Features
In addition to every incredible features of the other game, we add
  • A new version of the house to explore
  • Some more complex puzzles, be aware with the math
  • A gazelle with a demon, a little angry
  • Search closely the objects
  • Bartolomeu in the conversations
  • More not so intelligent quips

How to get out? Bananas? Cactus? Someone holds the duck!!!
1620860.supported_languages:
英语*, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
